an4.180:2.3: ‘sammukha metam, avuso, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam—
an4.180:2.4: ayam dhammo, ayam vinayo, idam satthusasanan’ti.
an4.180:2.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhasitam neva abhinanditabbam nappatikkositabbam.
